name: LEGO DC Super Heroes Chase
description:
PLAY AS POPULAR LEGO® DC COMICS CHARACTERS!

The LEGO® DC Super Heroes Chase game is for the all the world’s greatest, secret 5-12-year-old Super Heroes and Super Villains. Players will enter a fun, action-packed story as one of their favorite DC Comics characters – and play as Superman™, Batman™, Wonder Woman™, drive the coolest Super Hero vehicles to chase down Super Villains, and save the day! Or they can be a Super Villain like Bizarro™, Killer Moth™ and Doomsday™, and wreak havoc, and rule the world (or at least the city) as only an evil genius can!

FEATURES
- ACTION-PACKED ROLE-PLAY: One day you can be a hero, the next day a villain. It’s easy to pick a mission in the mission control center, and save the day as the hero or wreak havoc as the villain!
- UNLOCK AND UPGRADE: Collectible LEGO studs unlock new characters and honks!
- UNIQUE STORY BUILDER: Fun cinematics help the player build their own story.
- FUN EFFECTS AND VEHICLES: Every Super Hero or Super Villain needs top equipment and gear like Batarangs or cocoon guns, clubs, or invisible jets to stay ahead of the game – but they must be used wisely!
- AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation, and lots of humor!
- SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.

Why play with LEGO DC Super Heroes?
LEGO DC Super Heroes Mighty Micros is a world full of your favorite classic heroes and villains, with a fun, creative LEGO twist. It’s empowering to play a hero, and it’s thrilling to play the bad guy when you know it’s just a game! We hope this game will inspire hours of role-play, both here, and in real life! Who knows, maybe you will discover what kind of hero YOU are along the way?
